name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ生誕祭2025 】超重大発表あり！Sincerely,Towa【 3DLIVE 】 [I4FbpwMb78U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Promotional video for Tokoyami Towa's 2nd Solo Live 'SHINIER'.
Tokoyami Towa speaking to the audience after the announcement PV.

subtitles.original: はずの今日を 好きなんだって
subtitles.english: Saying you like today as it should be

subtitles.original: 不公平な 友情だって 期待したって
subtitles.english: Even if it's an unfair friendship, even if I expect it

subtitles.original: No pain, No gain
subtitles.english: No pain, No gain

subtitles.original: どのハートも 毒仕掛け
subtitles.english: Every heart is a poison trap

subtitles.original: 任された 毒手になって
subtitles.english: Becoming the entrusted poison hand

subtitles.original: ジュースはもう 消し去っていいよ
subtitles.english: You can erase the juice now

subtitles.original: 甘い音 包む幻想
subtitles.english: Sweet sounds, an enveloping illusion

subtitles.original: 囚われるのに 救えない
subtitles.english: Imprisoned, yet unable to be saved

subtitles.original: 水のように 透き通った 溜め息
subtitles.english: A sigh as transparent as water

subtitles.original: Don't see your side in the memory
subtitles.english: Don't see your side in the memory

subtitles.original: 忘れてた事も
subtitles.english: Even the things I'd forgotten

subtitles.original: 忘れてきた白夜闇 頭に響く足音
subtitles.english: The midnight sun's darkness I've forgotten, footsteps echoing in my head

subtitles.original: 迷いもなく 振り向かない
subtitles.english: Without hesitation, I won't look back

subtitles.original: Tell me many many more... wow
subtitles.english: Tell me many many more... wow

subtitles.original: Chewy Chewy
subtitles.english: Chewy Chewy

subtitles.original: くだらないって 笑って 惑わせて
subtitles.english: Call it worthless, laugh, and lead me astray

subtitles.original: 有象無象 風に吹かれ 目に打たれ Fade out
subtitles.english: The masses blown by the wind, struck in the eyes, Fade out

subtitles.original: 今日と明日を 描いて
subtitles.english: Drawing today and tomorrow

subtitles.original: くだらたって 始まりね 火を灯せ
subtitles.english: Even if it's worthless, it's a beginning, light the fire

subtitles.original: Hello, Hello 差し舞って 疑って お好きの
subtitles.english: Hello, Hello, offer a dance, doubt it, just as you like

subtitles.original: Trust me... Hook up baby
subtitles.english: Trust me... Hook up baby

subtitles.original: Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew
subtitles.english: Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew

subtitles.original: Mogu mogu mogu Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew
subtitles.english: Mogu mogu mogu Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew

subtitles.original: 手を合わせ何度も カッ飛ばしてしまった迷路
subtitles.english: Joining hands, time and again, I've dashed through the maze

subtitles.original: 騙されたまま いたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to remain deceived

subtitles.original: 退屈なのは 正解は
subtitles.english: Being bored is the correct answer

subtitles.original: 傷は癒えぬまま いたいわ
subtitles.english: I want the wounds to remain unhealed

subtitles.original: 消えちゃって なぁ まざらし見て見ぬふり
subtitles.english: Just disappear, hey, pretending not to see it clearly

subtitles.original: 帰る場所はどこだったっけ まっさらで
subtitles.english: Where was the place to return to? It was brand new

subtitles.original: 傷一つね 囲んで 今を いじれ
subtitles.english: Surrounding a single wound, mess with the present

subtitles.original: あっちでも前でも 付け足ら選べた 嗤いしちゃ 落ち着かないでしょ
subtitles.english: There or in front, if I added it I could choose, you can't settle down if you're sneering, right?

subtitles.original: たまさか 苦境を 表現する すっぱ多は 編み出した全部
subtitles.english: By chance, expressing the hardship, the acidity has woven everything together

subtitles.original: 具体的な 未来は バーガー この傷跡 疼かせて ディダース
subtitles.english: The concrete future is a burger, making this scar throb, didas

subtitles.original: 大したことないと思うなら 受け止めて ホラ 勇気ない
subtitles.english: If you think it's no big deal, then take it, look, you have no courage

subtitles.original: くだらないって 笑って 惑わせて
subtitles.english: Call it worthless, laugh, and lead me astray

subtitles.original: 有象無象 風に吹かれ 目に打たれ Fade out
subtitles.english: The masses blown by the wind, struck in the eyes, Fade out

subtitles.original: 今日と明日を 描いて
subtitles.english: Drawing today and tomorrow

subtitles.original: 焦がれたって 始まりね 火を灯せ
subtitles.english: Even if I've yearned for it, it's a beginning, light the fire

subtitles.original: Hello, Hello 差し舞って 疑って お好きの
subtitles.english: Hello, Hello, offer a dance, doubt it, just as you like

subtitles.original: Trust me... Hook up baby
subtitles.english: Trust me... Hook up baby

subtitles.original: どうしたいって 想い 飽きたさ 差し伸べないで
subtitles.english: I'm tired of wondering what I want to do, don't reach out

subtitles.original: 抱いて揺れ 甘えちゃうわ
subtitles.english: Holding me and swaying, I'll end up being spoiled

subtitles.original: さらば かつての自分よ あなたを縛る時代よ
subtitles.english: Farewell to my former self, to the era that bound you

subtitles.original: I don't care, so don't care この旅路へ
subtitles.english: I don't care, so don't care on this journey

subtitles.original: くだらないって 笑って 惑わせて
subtitles.english: Call it worthless, laugh, and lead me astray

subtitles.original: 有象無象 風に吹かれ 目に打たれ Fade out
subtitles.english: The masses blown by the wind, struck in the eyes, Fade out

subtitles.original: 今日と明日を 描いて
subtitles.english: Drawing today and tomorrow

subtitles.original: 焦がれたって 始まりね 火を灯せ
subtitles.english: Even if I've yearned for it, it's a beginning, light the fire

subtitles.original: Hello, Hello 差し舞って 疑って お好きの
subtitles.english: Hello, Hello, offer a dance, doubt it, just as you like

subtitles.original: Trust me... Hook up baby
subtitles.english: Trust me... Hook up baby

subtitles.original: Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew
subtitles.english: Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew

subtitles.original: Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew
subtitles.english: Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew

subtitles.original: Mogu mogu mogu Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew
subtitles.english: Mogu mogu mogu Chewy Chew, Chewy Chew

subtitles.original: 手を合わせ何度も カッ飛ばしてしまった迷路
subtitles.english: Joining hands, time and again, I've dashed through the maze

subtitles.original: この道はどこへ続いているのだろう？
subtitles.english: Where is this road leading to?

subtitles.original: 目の前に
subtitles.english: Before my eyes

subtitles.original: 無数に
subtitles.english: Countless

subtitles.original: 別れた
subtitles.english: branched

subtitles.original: 可能性が広がっている。
subtitles.english: possibilities are spreading.

subtitles.original: ワタシは、私であるために
subtitles.english: I, in order to be myself

subtitles.original: 自分を縛る言葉は捨てて、
subtitles.english: will discard the words that bind me,

subtitles.original: 広がっていくのは
subtitles.english: what spreads out is

subtitles.original: 私だけの、まだ知らない光。
subtitles.english: my own, yet unknown light.

subtitles.original: 10.29 ARIAKE ARENA
subtitles.english: 10.29 ARIAKE ARENA

subtitles.original: Tokoyami Towa 2nd Live SHINIER
subtitles.english: Tokoyami Towa 2nd Live SHINIER

subtitles.original: 進め。輝き溢れる、光の先へ。
subtitles.english: Advance. Towards the brilliance-overflowing light.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、なんと、えー、常闇トワのセカンドソロライブが、
subtitles.english: Everyone, believe it or not, Tokoyami Towa's 2nd solo live...

subtitles.original: 決定しましたー！
subtitles.english: ...has been confirmed!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！うおら！来たぞ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Wooh! It's here!

subtitles.original: ついに公開された！
subtitles.english: It's finally been revealed!

subtitles.original: 良かったー！
subtitles.english: I'm so glad!

subtitles.original: ここまでいたったんですけど、まだここが始まりなんだけど、
subtitles.english: I've made it this far, but this is still just the beginning,

subtitles.original: 頑張りますからね。
subtitles.english: so I'll do my best.

subtitles.original: どうです？びっくりしました？
subtitles.english: How was it? Were you surprised?

subtitles.original: ありがとう、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 泣きそう、わかる。
subtitles.english: You look like you're gonna cry? I get it.

subtitles.original: ちょっと泣きそうなのわかりますわ、一緒。
subtitles.english: I understand feeling a bit teary-eyed, same here.

subtitles.original: でも、取っておきましょう、それは皆。
subtitles.english: But let's save those tears, everyone.

subtitles.original: 今じゃないわ。
subtitles.english: Now isn't the time.

subtitles.original: 取っておこう。本番までに。
subtitles.english: Let's save them for the actual show.

subtitles.original: えー、ということで。
subtitles.english: Alright, so.

subtitles.original: 今回のね、ライブタイトルは、常闇トワセカンドライブ『SHINIER』
subtitles.english: The title for this live performance is: Tokoyami Towa 2nd Live "SHINIER".
